verses.verse: When a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>taketh<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H1166>marrieth<s%> <S%H4672>her<s%>, then it shall be, if she find no <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, because he hath <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1697>some<s%> <S%H6172>unseemly<s%> thing in <S%H3789>her<s%>, that he shall write her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorcement<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H7971>send<s%> her out of his <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And when she is departed <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, she may <S%H1980>go<s%> and be <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>'s wife.

And if the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H3789>her<s%>, and write her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorcement<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H7971>send<s%> her out of his <S%H1004>house<s%>; or if the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, who <S%H3947>took<s%> her to be his <S%H802>wife<s%>;

her <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H1167>husband<s%>, who sent her <S%H7971>away<s%>, <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H3947>take<s%> her <S%H7725>again<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that she is <S%H2930>defiled<s%>; for that is <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and thou shalt not cause the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

When a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>taketh<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, he shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H6635>host<s%>, neither shall he be <S%H5674>charged<s%> with any <S%H1697>business<s%>: he shall be <S%H5355>free<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and shall <S%H8055>cheer<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> whom he hath <S%H3947>taken<s%>.
No man shall <S%H2254>take<s%> the <S%H7347>mill<s%> or the upper <S%H7393>millstone<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge<s%>; for he <S%H2254>taketh<s%> a <S%H5315>man<s%>'s life to <S%H2254>pledge<s%>.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1589>stealing<s%> <S%H5315>any<s%> of his <S%H251>brethren<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he <S%H6014>deal<s%> with him as a <S%H4376>slave<s%>, or sell <S%H1590>him<s%>; then that thief shall <S%H4191>die<s%>: so shalt thou <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>thee<s%>.

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> in the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>, that thou <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H3966>diligently<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H6680>you<s%>: as I commanded <S%H8104>them<s%>, so ye shall observe to <S%H6213>do<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> what <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H4813>Miriam<s%>, by the <S%H1870>way<s%> as ye came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

When thou dost <S%H5383>lend<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H3972>any<s%> <S%H4859>manner<s%> of <S%H935>loan<s%>, thou shalt not go into his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H5670>fetch<s%> his <S%H5667>pledge<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>, and the <S%H376>man<s%> to whom thou dost <S%H5383>lend<s%> shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> without unto <S%H2351>thee<s%>.
And if he be a <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with his <S%H5667>pledge<s%>;

thou shalt <S%H7725>surely<s%> <S%H7725>restore<s%> to <S%H7725>him<s%> the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goeth <S%H935>down<s%>, that he may <S%H7901>sleep<s%> in his <S%H8008>garment<s%>, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H6666>thee<s%>: and it shall be righteousness unto thee <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H6231>oppress<s%> a hired <S%H7916>servant<s%> that is <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>, whether he be of thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, or of thy <S%H1616>sojourners<s%> that are in thy <S%H776>land<s%> within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

in his <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H7939>hire<s%>, neither shall the <S%H8121>sun<s%> go <S%H935>down<s%> upon <S%H6041>it<s%>; for he is poor, and <S%H5375>setteth<s%> his <S%H5315>heart<s%> upon <S%H7121>it<s%>: lest he cry against thee unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and it be sin unto <S%H2399>thee<s%>.

The <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall not be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%>, neither shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for the <S%H1>fathers<s%>: every <S%H376>man<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for his own <S%H2399>sin<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H5186>wrest<s%> the <S%H4941>justice<s%> due to the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>, or to the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, nor <S%H2254>take<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%>'s <S%H899>raiment<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge<s%>;

but thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> that thou wast a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> thee <S%H6680>thence<s%>: therefore I command thee to <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.

When thou <S%H7114>reapest<s%> thy <S%H7105>harvest<s%> in thy <S%H7704>field<s%>, and hast <S%H7911>forgot<s%> a <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, thou shalt not go <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H1616>it<s%>: it shall be for the sojourner, for the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and for the <S%H490>widow<s%>; that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

When thou <S%H2251>beatest<s%> thine <S%H2132>olive-tree<s%>, thou shalt not go over the <S%H6286>boughs<s%> <S%H310>again<s%>: it shall be for the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>, for the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and for the <S%H490>widow<s%>.

When thou <S%H1219>gatherest<s%> the grapes of thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H5953>glean<s%> it <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1616>thee<s%>: it shall be for the sojourner, for the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and for the <S%H490>widow<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> that thou wast a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: therefore I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee to <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.
